alert.note: Alert for Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:23PM CDT until July 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR STEELE AND NORTHERN WASECA COUNTIES... At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waseca, or 18 miles west of Owatonna, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Owatonna and Medford around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Clinton Falls, Waseca Airport, Alma City, Lemond, Merton, Bixby, Deerfield, Owatonna Airport, Smiths Mill and Moland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
